Legislative History of Laws

DC CODE § 7-2813

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Unless otherwise provided, the conduct of any civil trial commenced pursuant to § 7-2812 shall be governed by the Rules of the Superior Court of the District of Columbia.

In such trial, the complaint of a violation of this chapter shall be brought in the name of the District of Columbia by the Corporation Counsel. The burden of proof shall be upon the District of Columbia and no violation of this chapter may be established except upon proof by a preponderance of the evidence.

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Security and Fire Alarm Systems Regulations.
